metadata.title: CVE-2024-49967 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Rejected reason: This CVE ID has been rejected or withdrawn by its CVENumbering Authority.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-49967` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-51-generic - 6.8.0-51.52
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-51-generic - 6.8.0-51.52
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-51-generic-64k - 6.8.0-51.52
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1021-aws - 6.8.0-1021.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1020-azure - 6.8.0-1020.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1020-gcp - 6.8.0-1020.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1016-gke - 6.8.0-1016.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1018-ibm - 6.8.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-51-lowlatency - 6.8.0-51.52.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-51-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-51.52.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1018-oracle - 6.8.0-1018.19
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1018-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1018.19
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1019-oem - 6.8.0-1019.19
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1017-raspi - 6.8.0-1017.19
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-2016-raspi-realtime - 6.8.0-2016.17
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.1-1014-realtime - 6.8.1-1014.15
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1017.24
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-51.52').
linux-aws package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1021.23').
linux-azure package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1020.23').
linux-gcp package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1020.22').
linux-gke package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1016.20').
linux-ibm package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1018.18').
linux-lowlatency package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-51.52.1').
linux-oracle package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1018.19').
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1019.19').
linux-raspi package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1017.19').
linux-raspi-realtime package in realtime/noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-2016.17').
linux-realtime package in realtime/noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.1-1014.15').
linux-intel package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1017.24').
